name: Roll The Dice (kfir botnik)
description:
Roll The Dice

This is a fun little dicey puzzle game with 5 levels (we had 48 hours lol), we will add more after the gamejam.

Tips

in order to pick up the wheels press E + [Num]  (right now the only tool is the wheels but we will add arms and laser later on),

If you got stuck or can't reach something just hold CTRL for 1.5 seconds and that will reload the level and let you do it that time

Story

we all worked very hard on this game and it was very fun (yet very stressful lol). Hope you enjoy the game :)
